TEI.2.document_title: John Beadbetter to Stephen F Austin, Branch T Archer, and William H Wharton, 05-02-1836

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., The Austin Papers, (Austin: University of Texas Press, 1927), 3 vols., Vol 3, pp. 344

div1.p: To Genl Austin, Col Wharton and Dr Archer

Feeling interested for the Cause of Texas, and being So Situated in life that I cannot aid them personally I would beg Your acceptance of the Within as a Small testimony of My good wishes for their Success, over the blood thirsty Tyrant of the Mexican butchers
